summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5801 for the improvement of Stanley Avenue, from Albro Place to Hardy Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 76485 as amended by Ordinance No. 76757, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
